Title: Expands requirements for public notification of public meetings
Summary: Establishes when a public body has the ability to do so that the time and place of a public meeting shall be conspicuously posted on an internet website and sent by electronic mail to any individuals who have registered with the public body to receive such by electronic mail.
LawCode: Amd ยง104, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to expanding requirements for public notification of public meetings
